whatIs.title: What is it?
whatIs.subtitle: Software | Vulnerability | Scan | Networks
whatIs.description: It is a software designed to analyze available WiFi networks. Upon selecting a specific network, the software can perform the following functions:
whatIs.feature1: Scan the network to detect connected devices.
whatIs.feature2: Identify the operating system of each device.
whatIs.feature3: Assess the vulnerabilities of connected devices, if possible.
whatIs.feature4: Use a Raspberry Pi for data collection.

whoFor.title: Who is it for?
whoFor.subtitle: Individuals passionate about cybersecurity
whoFor.description: It is for individuals who are passionate about cybersecurity and want to add an extra layer of security to their networks by performing daily diagnostics to enhance the safety of their WiFi.

origin.title: How did it start?
origin.subtitle: From an idea to a project
origin.description: It began as a mere idea, but after giving it some thought, we realized it would be a great project for the thesis we needed to present. We conducted research until we could solidify this fantastic concept. The more we studied the topic, the more passionate we became about developing this project for the community.

feature3.title: Downloadable Reports
feature3.description: Delete and download scan history in PDF format.

feature4.title: Advanced Security Features
feature4.description: Supports two-factor authentication, password recovery, and change password functionality.

feature5.title: Compatibility
feature5.description: Compatible with Raspberry Pi 3 B+ and later versions.

feature6.title: Highly Configurable
feature6.description: Customize and adjust settings according to your specific needs in network auditing.
